method.name: Lazy Decision Tree

reference.ref: J. Friedman, R. Kohavi and Y. Yun, Lazy decision trees, Proceedings of the Thirteenth National Conference on Artificial Intellgence (pp. 717.724), Cambridge, MA: AAAI Press/MIT Press, 1996

generalDescription.type: Lazy Learning based on a decision tree classifier
generalDescription.objective: To perform a classification task by means of a decision tree classifier, where a path is created for each classification instance
generalDescription.howWork: Similar to other lazy learning algorithms, the great computation of this algorithm is postponed to the classification step. When classifying a path is created for each classification instance looking at the specific attribute values of the instance and choosing the attribute separation accordingly.
